channel.title: NPC and Object Model Ids

item.title: NPC and Object Model Ids
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Comes in handy for repacking broken NPC models or Object models. Have fun.

NPCs:

public static void dumpModels() { int id = 1; EntityDef npc = EntityDef.forID(id); System.out.println(npc.name); if(npc.anIntArray94 != null) { for(int modelid = 0; modelid < npc.anIntArray94.length; modelid++) { System.out.println(npc.anIntArray94[modelid]); } } }

Objects:

public static void dumpModels() { int id = 1; ObjectDef object = ObjectDef.forID(id); System.out.println(object.name); if(object.anIntArray773 != null) { for(int modelid = 0; modelid < object.anIntArray773.length; modelid++) { System.out.println(object.anIntArray773[modelid]); } } }

Read full topic
